feed.subtitle: A simple, whxtespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Hyperparameter optimization for quantum machine learning with Amazon Braket

link.title: Hyperparameter optimization for quantum machine learning with Amazon Braket

entry.content: This post is a redirect to [Quantum HPO] (https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/quantum-computing/hyperparameter-optimization-for-quantum-machine-learning-with-amazon-braket/).
entry.summary: Use best practices from machine learning to improve quantum experiment management and hyperparameter optimization.

entry.title: Build and train computer vision models to detect car positions in images using Amazon SageMaker and Amazon Rekognition

link.title: Build and train computer vision models to detect car positions in images using Amazon SageMaker and Amazon Rekognition

entry.content: This post is a redirect to [Car position detection] (https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/machine-learning/build-and-train-computer-vision-models-to-detect-car-positions-in-images-using-amazon-sagemaker-and-amazon-rekognition/).
entry.summary: Quickly build an algorithm to detect the position of cars without complex custom models and fine-tuning, by using clever post-processing.

entry.title: Using Computer Vision to Enable Digital Building Twins with NavVis and AWS

link.title: Using Computer Vision to Enable Digital Building Twins with NavVis and AWS

entry.content: This post is a redirect to [Digital Building Twin] (https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/apn/using-computer-vision-to-enable-digital-building-twins-with-navvis-and-aws/).
entry.summary: Build an L1 Digital Building Twin using building scanning technology, computer vision algorithms and a human-in-the-loop approach.

entry.title: Using Digital Twins to Drive Electric Vehicle Battery Insights with MHP and AWS

link.title: Using Digital Twins to Drive Electric Vehicle Battery Insights with MHP and AWS

entry.content: This post is a redirect to Battery Digital Twin.
entry.summary: Build self-managed battery models tailored to individual entities using micro services and Bayesian calibration techniques.
